data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Thái Bình, Vietnam that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thái Bình, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Thái Bình, Vietnam.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Thái Bình, Vietnam to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Thái Bình, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, 1.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please give the people in the state of Thái Bình access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Thái Bình, Vietnam to the gospel today.

data.section_summary:
the state of Thái Bình, Vietnam has a population of 1,781,000.

We estimate Thái Bình has 38,521 people who might know Jesus, 142,858 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,599,620 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Thái Bình.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
